original_text: And he gathered up all the food of the seven years, which were in the land of Egypt, and laid up the food in the cities: the food of the field, which was round about every city, laid he up in the same.
korean_text: 요셉이 애굽 땅에 있는 그 칠 년 곡물을 거두어 각 성에 저장하되 각 성읍 주위의 밭의 곡물을 그 성읍 중에 쌓아 두매

sentences.original_text: And he gathered up all the food of the seven years
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 일곱 해 동안의 모든 양식을 거두어

sentences.original_text: which were in the land of Egypt
and laid up the food in the cities
which was round about every city
laid he up in the same
